alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 15 at 2:47PM MST until August 15 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE PIPELINE FIRE SCAR BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 245 PM MST, emergency management reported water flowing over Henry Drive. Between 0.25 and 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.25 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Pipeline Fire scar. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Pipeline Fire scar. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hutchison Acres and Timberline. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the Pipeline Fire scar. Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving.
